Text: I have been looking for this for YEARS!  I can't believe that fucking moron John Korty had it censored and *then* released it (it was the UN-censored version that got so much attention!).  Kudos to you, AFakeName! :-D
I have access to the original VHS tape, but it's already poor quality and only has about two or three viewings left.  Any advice on transferring it would be appreciated.

Audio: 4/10
Video: 3/10
However, this is a very difficult to find film. Plus, even more rare as the uncensored version.
